name: squirrel
description: An simple project for users who use node service to transfrom RESTful API.
author: Li Xipeng <lixipeng@hihuron.com>

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/ test/acceptance/
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/ test/acceptance/
